title: Boutique Mexico Heritage Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & US$50 Spa Credit
description:
Embraced by vast tropical vegetation, reconnect with nature and discover the nuances of Mayan culture at this secluded retreat on Mexico's Yucatan Peninsula. Combining colourful colonial architecture with traditional Mayan influences, this restored 17th-century estate invites you to unwind amid tranquil surroundings.

Housed within an ambient cave, rejuvenate your spirit with ancient Mayan healing techniques at the spa, and indulge in regional cuisine at Casa Temozón restaurant, savouring fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Celebrate life's pleasures by the turquoise pool, and when it's time to explore, visit the vibrant city of Merida and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Uxmal both within and hour's drive.
location_description: Hacienda Temozon Sur, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 182 Carretera Merida-Uxmal, Temozon Sur, Yucatan 97825, Mexico
